# fn-queue

> utility for running functions in a queued manner


## Install

```sh
$ npm install fn-queue
```

## Usage

```js
var Queue = require('fn-queue')
var q = new Queue()
q.add(function add(a, b){
    return a + b
})
q.add(function mul(a, b){
    return a * b
})
q.execute(4, 5)
//or, if you want the results
q.collect(4,5) // [9, 20]
```
